name: Hand Strike
description:
Grab your enemies from their heads, arms or legs and literally play with their lives! Throw them into fans! Feed them to the dinosaurs! Run after them with some skunks! Choose your eliminate method and make it happen!

You control the environment. However you want to annihilate the bad guys is completely up to you!

== GAME FEATURES ==
◉ Lots of fun content for FREE!
◉ Super easy to navigate!
◉ Freedom in how you approach levels.
◉ Choose whichever trap you want!
◉ Hilarious animations and face reactions!
◉ Fun weapons and glorious hand skins at your disposal!
publishers: Rollic Games Oyun Yazilim ve Pazarlama Anonim Sirketi
